summary: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world in 1206.
cast: Tadanobu Asano|Honglei Sun|Khulan Chuluun|Aliya|Baasanjav Mijid|Amadu Mamadakov|He Qi|Ben Hon Sun|Ji Ri Mu Tu|You Er|Huntun Batu|Deng Ba Te Er|Bao Di|Su Ya La Su Rong|Sai Xing Ga|Tegen Ao|Zhang Jiong|Odnyam Odsuren|Bayertsetseg Erdenebat|Amarbold Tuvshinbayar|Ba Ti|Li Jia Qi|Bu Ren|Te Ba|Bayaneruul|Ba Yin Qi Qi Ge|Ba De Rong Gui|Naryn Igilik|Tunga|Birol Tarkan Yildiz
title: Mongol
